title: Brand new house for sale in Thalawathugoda
details:
This spacious brand new luxury house with four bedrooms and four bathrooms offers a beautiful home with ultramodern design.

Distributed over three floors with balcony spaces, spacious living areas ,bedrooms and the house boasts an outside garden space with a unique architectural design .

It is being built to the highest environmental and technological standards, with top quality fittings.

3300 square-feet area
Fully A/C rooms and hot water facility to all parts of the house.

Fully equipped modern pantry and separate maids room and washroom

Located conveniently with a short drive from Thalawathugoda junction , just about 45 minutes drive from Colombo and easy access to highway entrance.
